name: Cleric
details: You are an ordained priest of your deity and have even learned how to cast a few divine spells. Though your main training lies elsewhere, your religious calling provides you divine gifts.

pf2t.name: Cleric
pf2t.body: You are an ordained priest of your deity and have even learned how to cast a few divine spells. Though your main training lies elsewhere, your religious calling provides you divine gifts.

pf2t.name: Cleric
pf2t.body: This indicates abilities from the cleric class.

name: Cleric Dedication
details: You cast spells like a cleric. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You can prepare two common cantrips each day from the divine spell list in this book or any other cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for divine spells. Your key spellcasting ability for cleric archetype spells is Wisdom, and they are divine cleric spells. Choose a deity as you would if you were a cleric. You become bound by that deity's anathema. You become trained in Religion and your deity's associated skill; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of deity.
special: You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the cleric archetype.

pf2t.name: Cleric Dedication
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Wisdom 14

- - -

You cast spells like a cleric. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You can prepare two common cantrips each day from the divine spell list in this book or any other divine cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for divine spells. Your key spellcasting ability for cleric archetype spells is Wisdom, and they are divine cleric spells. Choose a deity as you would if you were a cleric. You become bound by that deity's anathema. You become trained in Religion and your deity's associated skill; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of deity.

#### Cleric Dedication Leads To...
Basic Cleric Spellcasting, Basic Dogma

name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
details: You gain the basic spellcasting benefts (page 219). You can prepare your deity's spells in your spell slots of the appropriate level from the cleric archetype.

pf2t.name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Cleric Dedication

- - -

You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. You can prepare your deity's spells in your spell slots of the appropriate level from the cleric archetype.

#### Basic Cleric Spellcasting Leads To...
Divine Breadth, Expert Cleric Spellcasting

name: Basic Dogma
details: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat.

pf2t.name: Basic Dogma
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Cleric Dedication

- - -

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat.

#### Basic Dogma Leads To...
Advanced Dogma

name: Advanced Dogma
details: You gain one cleric feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your cleric level is equal to half your character level.
special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another cleric feat.

pf2t.name: Advanced Dogma
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Basic Dogma

- - -

You gain one cleric feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your cleric level is equal to half your character level.

name: Divine Breadth
details: You can cast more divine spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from cleric archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

pf2t.name: Divine Breadth
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Basic Cleric Spellcasting

- - -

You can cast more divine spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from cleric archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest cleric spell slots.

name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
details: You gain the expert spellcasting benefts (page 219).

pf2t.name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Basic Cleric Spellcasting; master in Religion

- - -

You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

#### Expert Cleric Spellcasting Leads To...
Master Cleric Spellcasting

name: Master Cleric Spellcasting
details: You gain the master spellcasting benefts (page 219).

pf2t.name: Master Cleric Spellcasting
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Cleric
**Prerequisites** Expert Cleric Spellcasting; legendary in Religion

- - -

You gain the master spellcasting benefits.
